ai-anya-e0601n0:0_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-anya-e0601n0:3_0: The one who is happy and happily excellent, who has given up wholesome and unwholesome deeds,
ai-anya-e0601n0:4_0: that is the deathless, unselfish, peaceful,
ai-anya-e0601n0:5_0: Who found the Refuge, and is the refuge for the world, the one without passions, who makes the passions fade,
ai-anya-e0601n0:6_0: The one without fear, who leads to that fearless place: I will revere (Lord Buddha), the Leader.
ai-anya-e0601n0:8_0: Having body and limbs lovely to the eyes,
ai-anya-e0601n0:9_0: Endowed with a noble and sweet voice,
ai-anya-e0601n0:10_0: The receptacle of many measureless virtues:
ai-anya-e0601n0:11_0: worshipping the One of Ten Powers,
ai-anya-e0601n0:13_0: He who is Buddha, the bearer of steadfast knowledge,
ai-anya-e0601n0:14_0: Who underwent in the continual round of existence, both bodily
ai-anya-e0601n0:15_0: And mental suffering for the sake of the world:
ai-anya-e0601n0:16_0: I worship Him, who is a blessing for men and gods.
ai-anya-e0601n0:18_0: He who has the thirty-two beautiful marks on his body,
ai-anya-e0601n0:19_0: Whose body shines with an effulgence of light,
ai-anya-e0601n0:20_0: Who possesses an ocean of wisdom, steadfastness, morality and virtue:
ai-anya-e0601n0:21_0: I worship that Sage who is in his final birth.
ai-anya-e0601n0:23_0: like a fresh sun rising in the morning,
ai-anya-e0601n0:24_0: With charming grace in the midst of those who strive,
ai-anya-e0601n0:25_0: Having a face like a full moon, lust-free:
ai-anya-e0601n0:26_0: I worship the omniscient Lord of Sages.
ai-anya-e0601n0:28_0: Endowed with merit, at the root of the Bodhi tree
ai-anya-e0601n0:29_0: the Happy One, after defeating Māra and his army,
ai-anya-e0601n0:30_0: Awoke to Wisdom as the dawn broke:
ai-anya-e0601n0:31_0: I revere Him, the unbroken one, who defeated the (five) deaths.
ai-anya-e0601n0:33_0: That one having the sword of undefiled knowledge that cuts off passion and so on,
ai-anya-e0601n0:34_0: Who holds up the shield known as mindfulness,
ai-anya-e0601n0:35_0: Who is adorned with the decoration of an ocean of morality: Him
ai-anya-e0601n0:36_0: I revere, the one endowed with noble knowledge and psychic power.
ai-anya-e0601n0:38_0: That abode of sympathy, who (overcoming) difficulties everywhere,
ai-anya-e0601n0:39_0: Rather than decay of the path—
ai-anya-e0601n0:40_0: The well-composed Lord of the Three Worlds who is a benefit (to others):
ai-anya-e0601n0:41_0: I bow down to the measureless All-Seeing One.
ai-anya-e0601n0:43_0: In this place and that place he accumulated a store of perfections,
ai-anya-e0601n0:44_0: He has attained the happy resting place of the virtuous,
ai-anya-e0601n0:45_0: And is the origin and source of happiness for men and gods,
ai-anya-e0601n0:46_0: I revere the noble Victor, who (overcame) the disrespectful fools.
ai-anya-e0601n0:48_0: The Sage and skilful mariner ascended the ship of the Path-factors,
ai-anya-e0601n0:49_0: Grasped with the hand of knowledge the oar of exertion,
ai-anya-e0601n0:50_0: And crossed over the manifold ocean of existence:
ai-anya-e0601n0:51_0: Devote yourself to the Buddha: I revere Him.
ai-anya-e0601n0:54_0: Who, under the noble Bodhi tree, saw the Four Truths,
ai-anya-e0601n0:55_0: Attained the noble psychic powers, which benefit gods and men:
ai-anya-e0601n0:56_0: I bow down to the Victor, who stilled (rebirth in) the three (planes of) existence.
ai-anya-e0601n0:58_0: Having the marks that arose because of hundreds of merits, passionless,
ai-anya-e0601n0:59_0: which goes on the which top of the perfume, subdued by the sky,
ai-anya-e0601n0:61_0: who endures (like) the Earth: I bow down to the Victor.
ai-anya-e0601n0:63_0: He who is the wise Buddha, like the sun shining in the day,
ai-anya-e0601n0:64_0: * Resplendent, producing delight, while sitting on his stone throne,
ai-anya-e0601n0:65_0: Taught the Abhidhamma, which gives the happiness of safety,
ai-anya-e0601n0:66_0: to the gods: I always revere Him who is Matchless.
ai-anya-e0601n0:68_0: He who has tender skin on his lotus feet,
ai-anya-e0601n0:69_0: Who is unconfused, not lacking (in knowledge) about the three worlds,
ai-anya-e0601n0:71_0: Who is unequalled and honoured by the whole world: I revere Him.
ai-anya-e0601n0:73_0: The Buddha with steady mind, who brought together men and gods,
ai-anya-e0601n0:74_0: Who, with the lustre of the light of wisdom destroyed the darkness (of ignorance),
ai-anya-e0601n0:75_0: He who greatly desires the welfare and benefit of men and gods, Him
ai-anya-e0601n0:76_0: I worship, the great compassionate (Buddha), with infinite knowledge.
ai-anya-e0601n0:78_0: The one who, having approached and has familiar with the Enlightened One’s virtue,
ai-anya-e0601n0:79_0: The Wood called Isipatana, the abode of those restrained,
ai-anya-e0601n0:80_0: In that place the wheel was rolled forth by the wheel,
ai-anya-e0601n0:81_0: I revere Him of incomparable beauty, who should be worshipped.
ai-anya-e0601n0:84_0: The abode of many glories, having gone to the streams of the gods.
ai-anya-e0601n0:85_0: Virtue in circumference of his consciousness, depressed,
ai-anya-e0601n0:86_0: I revere the one who is worshipped the Holy One,
ai-anya-e0601n0:88_0: * With the raft of the Path, he crossed over the waves and currents of delusion, anger and desire
ai-anya-e0601n0:89_0: * The ocean of existences; the fearless one fully crossed over, and he established humanity’s
ai-anya-e0601n0:90_0: Shelter, safety and unequalled refuge, the one (true) haven:
ai-anya-e0601n0:91_0: I revere the happiness of the Dhamma and the greatest (of merit).
ai-anya-e0601n0:93_0: The Lord of Sages sitting at the root of the Kaṇḍamba tree, seeking the benefit of others,
ai-anya-e0601n0:94_0: Quickly wrought a wonder by scattering water and fire that was pleasing to the eyes,
ai-anya-e0601n0:95_0: Destroying the false net (of views), this miracle was not left undone by the Sage:
ai-anya-e0601n0:96_0: I worship Him, the praised origin of supreme delight,
ai-anya-e0601n0:98_0: That clever Sage, who is the rising dawn of compassion, having extensive knowledge,
ai-anya-e0601n0:99_0: Who leads over the watery ocean what are called lotuses with the noble rays of his Dhamma,
ai-anya-e0601n0:100_0: And awakens the pure of heart in the pit of the three worlds, widely-renowned,
ai-anya-e0601n0:101_0: The one (wisdom) eye of the three worlds, who endured suffering: I revere Him, the Great Sage.
ai-anya-e0601n0:103_0: * That Victor who, in countless lives, gave both his children and wife, his limbs and life,
ai-anya-e0601n0:104_0: and he gave the intent on awakening.
ai-anya-e0601n0:105_0: After giving, ethical conduct, and so on, the perfection of giving,
ai-anya-e0601n0:106_0: And reached the Highest through their (inherent) power: I revere Him, the one (true) Island.
ai-anya-e0601n0:108_0: “Looking to the Devas in the sky, they praised the unattached through the power of Māra.”
ai-anya-e0601n0:109_0: Who spread the light of wisdom on people, and attained Awakening on the noble victory seat,
ai-anya-e0601n0:110_0: Surrounded by brahmas and others, speaking with a noble voice,
ai-anya-e0601n0:111_0: Greatly delighting the worlds: I always greatly revere Him, the Lord of the (five) Sages.
ai-anya-e0601n0:113_0: The Buddha, having a form like the banyan tree, soft hands and feet, a voice like brahma, calves like an antelope,
ai-anya-e0601n0:114_0: And a foreskin that covers the organ, the Happy One, with steady feet,
ai-anya-e0601n0:115_0: then the one who is conquered through the destruction of hatred, and the Happy One,
ai-anya-e0601n0:116_0: Having blue eyes, long heels, exquisite skin, whose taste buds are the very best,
ai-anya-e0601n0:118_0: Having forty of the best teeth, even teeth, a full back between the shoulders,
ai-anya-e0601n0:119_0: Cannot overprocess that are without feet, without a leper-human,
ai-anya-e0601n0:120_0: Who, while standing, without bending, with both his soft hands, can touch his knees,
ai-anya-e0601n0:121_0: Whose body is round, the Victor, having eyelashes like an ox, the upper half of whose body is like a lion,
ai-anya-e0601n0:123_0: Seven on Aṅgulimāla, Aṅgulimāla, blessed with sal trees, and the monkey in his feet.
ai-anya-e0601n0:124_0: Accomplished in the measureless, is the blue-sphere cloth covering with blue,
ai-anya-e0601n0:125_0: Sīhahanu was like a light-layered sole; he was caught up with hands and feet.
ai-anya-e0601n0:126_0: Whose head has a crown, the Lord endowed with these (thirty-two) qualities: I revere Him, the Great Sage.
ai-anya-e0601n0:128_0: Awakened One, Buddha is extremely rare in the world, what to say of Buddhahood?
ai-anya-e0601n0:129_0: That is why the state who understands the worldly pleasures, being liberated in excess blessings.
ai-anya-e0601n0:130_0: Desiring their (true) welfare, should always revere Him, who is fearless, worthy, honoured by gods and men,
ai-anya-e0601n0:131_0: worshipped the One of Ten Powers, who is endowed with ten-fold strength:
ai-anya-e0601n0:134_0: I saw a clever person who is skilled in the realm of excessive, wealthy.
ai-anya-e0601n0:135_0: sesame is a disease, a poisonous worker, who is bound to his livelihood,
ai-anya-e0601n0:136_0: Rich, beautiful, famous, powerful, renowned, endowed with patience,
ai-anya-e0601n0:138_0: (He was) faithful, generous, adorned with the ultimate goal,
ai-anya-e0601n0:140_0: Few in wishes, contented, unbroken, fond of psychic power,
ai-anya-e0601n0:141_0: Praiseworthy, with loveable words, one who knows a good person’s virtue and may I be devoted (to the Triple Gem).
ai-anya-e0601n0:143_0: Except in this way the characteristic of foulness is characterized.
ai-anya-e0601n0:144_0: spoke these verses in the Vedas:
ai-anya-e0601n0:146_0: Fourth: the fourth (footer) horsefail Sāketa and the charioteer.
ai-anya-e0601n0:149_0: who endures (another) the four winds, that is to say,
ai-anya-e0601n0:150_0: would be one who gives permission of his (himself) welfare,
ai-anya-e0601n0:152_0: the immediately development of meditation subjects will maintain themselves,
ai-anya-e0601n0:153_0: or else in this life-form, long he is a term for himself.
ai-anya-e0601n0:155_0: honoured by all worlds: It is good fortune from all worlds.
ai-anya-e0601n0:156_0: He is dear and beloved to the people.
ai-anya-e0601n0:157_0: The Verses of the house was finished.
